about_the_game:
Story
SPIN UP is a climbing action game set on a planet.
After falling to an unknown planet, players aim for the top in order to return to their friends.

Overview
The game is controlled with the left and right keys, and the player climbs by "grabbing" and "spinning".

Pressing the key allows the player to grab onto any object,
While grabbing an object, the player rotates while accelerating.
The moment you release the key, it will fly away by the rotational force.

Where it flies depends on the rotation force and the timing of releasing the key.

Don't give up.
We are waiting for you at the top!


About video distribution
  • Both individuals and corporations can distribute their videos.
  • Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video sharing site.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: SPIN UP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a climbing action game. The goal is to reach the top by "grabbing" and "spinning."
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
